prHeadline: NIL Technology Launches Flat NIR Metalenses Ready for Mass Production
headlineTxt: Sep 01, 2021, 08:44 ETNIL Technology Launches Flat NIR Metalenses Ready for Mass ProductionEuropean Innovation Council (EIC). NILT creates competitive advantages with flat optics in optical applications for 3D sensing, consumer electronics, machine vision, autonomous vehicles, and VR/AR displays; all solutions made by diffractive optical elements (DOE) and metalenses/meta optical elements (MOE). NILTMore news about: NIL Technology
